statements: SELECT * FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE influencer_id = 5;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns, SUM(campaign_budget) AS total_budget FROM InfluencerCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE influencer_id = 3 AND campaign_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT influencer_id) AS unique_influencers, AVG(campaign_budget) AS avg_budget FROM InfluencerCampaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE budget > 500;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM influencer_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM influencer_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;

SELECT ic.influencer_id, ic.payment_amount, ic.collaboration_date, ic.campaign_id, icm.campaign_name FROM influencer_collaborations AS ic LEFT JOIN influencer_campaigns AS icm ON ic.campaign_id = icm.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 2000 AND 8000 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000
SELECT category, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT collaboration_type, payment FROM collaborations WHERE influencer_id = 2
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE influencer_id = 2;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers, category FROM influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion' AND followers BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE payment > 500 AND collaboration_type = 'Sponsored' ORDER BY collaboration_id ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, influencers.name FROM campaigns INNER JOIN influencers ON campaigns.influencer_id = influencers.influencer_id ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT email FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT id, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT i.name AS influencer_name, c.name AS campaign_name, col.collaboration_date FROM Influencers i JOIN Collaborations col ON i.id = col.influencer_id JOIN Campaigns c ON c.id = col.campaign_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, u.role FROM Users u WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM influencer_agencies
SELECT agency_name, email FROM influencer_agencies
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, payment_status FROM campaigns JOIN collaborations ON campaigns.campaign_id = collaborations.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM influencer_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, email FROM influencer_agencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, country FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborations JOIN campaigns ON collaborations.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE collaborations.influencer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, report_date, reach, engagement_rate FROM campaign_reports WHERE influencer_id = 2 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
